__e: Yes, I just got back a little while ago... and it was obvious that something... quite serious was going on out there.
Mary... what if something was going on, something terrible... and you knew that there was no way on earth that one man could stop it?
You said to let you know if something was going on here.
Oh, yes yes. I saw what was going on, on the telly.
Wait, that's not how he said it went down.
I'm not sure it happened exactly like that.
You knew what was happening and you didn't tell me!
Your father came home from the office and he saw what was going on, and he sat you down and he explained to you that the cat was in fact a tiger and that we needed to get it home.
Just tell them that I didn't know anything about what was going on and that Dan threatened me.
So when you called to tell him what had happened, he suspected me.
I asked you for months about shit going down here... and you told me to shut the fuck up.
I'm not sure I want to remember what went on down here.
So I need to know what was going on there.
I'd take the money and hand them a key and try not to think about what was happening upstairs.
We need to go back and talk about what just happened in there.
And it was at that point that he started to really, seriously look at what was happening with his life.
How important could it have been if his own son couldn't even talk to him about what was going on in his life?
It was a desperate position, made worse by the fact that that I had no idea what Joe was doing, or what position he was in.
